Capturing Claws.name: Capturing Claws
Capturing Claws.flavor: You snag your foe with one of your claws and rend the enemy with your weaker claws as long as it remains in your grasp.
keywords:
Melee touch

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength + 6, Constitution + 6, or Dexterity + 6 vs. Fortitude or Reflex
Capturing Claws.attack:
Strength + 6, Constitution + 6, or Dexterity + 6 vs. Fortitude or Reflex
Level 21: Strength + 9, Constitution + 9, or Dexterity + 9 vs. Fortitude or Reflex
Capturing Claws.onHit: 3d8 + Strength modifier, Constitution modifier, or Dexterity modifier damage, and you grab the target. Until the grab ends, the target takes 5 damage at the start of each of its turns.
Capturing Claws.special: While grabbing the target, you can use a move action to move one-half your speed and pull the target with you.

Paralyzing Bite.name: Paralyzing Bite
Paralyzing Bite.flavor: In the adrenaline rush of combat, your mandibles fill with a toxin that paralyzes a foe that you bite.
Paralyzing Bite.attack: Strength + 9, Constitution + 9, or Dexterity + 9 vs. Fortitude
Paralyzing Bite.onHit: 2d6 + Strength modifier, Constitution modifier, or Dexterity modifier poison damage, and the target is stunned until the end of your next turn. The target also takes ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends).

Insect's Spring.name: Insect's Spring
Insect's Spring.flavor: You suddenly leap across the battlefield, moving too quickly for your enemies to react.
keywords:
Personal

Effect: Make an Athletics check to jump. This jump does not provoke opportunity attacks.
Insect's Spring.effect: Make an Athletics check to jump. This jump does not provoke opportunity attacks.
